abstract.para: The chapter provides a description of available raw images of &slem;.

sect1.title: Default partitioning
sect1.para: The raw images ale delivered with a default partitioning scheme, which can be changed during the first boot by using Ignition or Combustion. For a procedure of repartitiong the system, refer to or .

important.title: Btrfs is mandatory for the root file system.
important.para: Bear in mind that if you intend to perform any changes to the default partitioning scheme, that the root file system must be btrfs.

sect1.para: Depending on the architecture, each image has the following subvolumes:
The images also have mounted subvolumes for booting by default. The concrete subvolumes differ according to the architecture.

sect1.title: First boot detection
sect1.para: The configuration runs on the first boot only and to distinquish between the first and subsequent boots, the /boot/ignition.firstboot is used.
